name: Amaha
description:
Amaha's services include self-care, peer support, therapy, psychiatric care, and much more, available both in-person at our centres in Mumbai, Bangalore, and Delhi, and online through call or video.

At Amaha, our teams consists of 110+ psychiatrists, and therapists, who provide support in 15+ Indian languages. In the last 2 years alone, we have completed over 50,000 therapy sessions and supported over 4.5 million people across 300+ Indian cities through our digital resource bank and self-help app.

We're proud to have partnered with over 50+ leading organisations to help build mentally healthy and resilient workforces through our Workplace Emotional Well-being Programmes. Our approach empowers employees with high-quality mental healthcare, so they have the tools they need to thrive.

We know everyone is different - and so are their needs, which is why we offer a range of personalisations to tailor our solutions to your unique needs. Whether you need therapy, psychiatry support, or access to self-care resources, we're here to support you. No matter where you are in your mental health journey, we will meet you there and partner with you.

enhanced_description: Amaha offers a comprehensive mental health and emotional well-being solution for individuals and organizations. For businesses, Amaha provides Workplace Emotional Well-being Programmes designed to build mentally healthy and resilient workforces. These programs empower employees with high-quality mental healthcare, including access to a large in-house team of 110+ psychiatrists and therapists supporting over 15 Indian languages. Services are delivered both online (via call/video and a self-help app with 600+ tools, activities, and articles) and in-person at centers in Mumbai, Bangalore, and Delhi. With a proven track record of over 50,000 therapy sessions and supporting over 4.5 million people across 300+ Indian cities, Amaha provides personalized mental health support tailored to individual needs, encompassing self-care, peer support, therapy, and psychiatric care. The platform also offers psychometric assessments and a safe peer support community.
